title: More from my sketch a day
body:
Hi again, I just wanted to post some more of my sketch a day since the last time I did. It's been a while since my last time posting these, so hopefully It's not intrusive.

For those of you that don't know, I'm sketching a champion a day until I've drawn every single champ in the game

If you're interested in checking out the original batch you can find them [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/jVaOIikI-a-few-sketches-of-some-of-my-favorite-characters)

These are ordered from oldest to most recent

https://orig14.deviantart.net/e166/f/2017/176/c/4/zacfanart_by_kyrin21-dbe25t3.png

https://orig15.deviantart.net/106a/f/2017/163/d/0/aurelionsolfanart_by_kyrin21-dbcgvup.png

https://orig07.deviantart.net/4473/f/2017/176/8/a/nautilus_by_kyrin21-dbe25ud.png

https://orig00.deviantart.net/a2ce/f/2017/176/a/a/skarnerfanart_by_kyrin21-dbe25tl.png

https://orig13.deviantart.net/b273/f/2017/176/6/a/shyvanafanartfix2_by_kyrin21-dbe25tz.png

https://orig12.deviantart.net/d831/f/2017/176/3/8/velkozfanart_by_kyrin21-dbe25te.png

https://orig11.deviantart.net/ae56/f/2017/176/c/1/kalistafanart_by_kyrin21-dbe25ur.png

https://orig06.deviantart.net/200c/f/2017/176/a/f/jhinfanart_by_kyrin21-dbe25v1.png

Hopefully you guys like em
And if your interested in following my progress on these you can check out my [Tumble](http://lekyrin.tumblr.com/) and/or my [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kyrin21)

replies.body: on my phone and cant really zoom in yo much, but shat is Sol holding?
A tiny human.
I'm pretty sure it's a normal sized human
I mean, he'd be normal sized if he was a little closer.
Yep, can confirm, there is a person climbing up his hand.
I shall continue to await for Taric, in the meantime the Nautilus art is pretty sick.  It is a shame that it isn't the right size for a phone lock screen.

Just because I love you
https://orig02.deviantart.net/50a6/f/2017/177/9/e/nautphonebg_by_kyrin21-dbe4ffs.png
I now wish that Wardens could hand out gold stars, because you definitely deserve one.
Velkoz looks like  a  frieghtened House wife weakly attempting to pick up a mouse ( love it)
It's probably a teemo infestation
waiting for urgot fam
I really wanna draw urgot, but I'm putting him off until the VU comes out
Gotta draw a "before and after" of him

Wish I could draw that well. :P

That aside, the Vel'koz and Jhin ones are really good.
Cool stuff bra

Artistry. This century's artistry. This is amazing my friend,  and it truly displays your creative capabilities. They way you've portrayed these characters with such emotion as well as motion in such a simple manner is fucking amazing. The composition, dynamic poses and the immersive'ness! Ah this is gorgeous. I'm in love with the Jhin and Skarner pieces, just wow. Can't wait to see Bard! Keep up the wonderful work m8, it's simply astonishing.
I love your artstyle, it looks a lot like something you'd see in a stylized comic book.  The colors and poses are pretty vibrant, keep up the good work :)
Thanks a lot, glad you like it :)
{{champion:429}}  :D Pretty
the vel one is very well done
Thanks, glad you like it!
These are all so good! Shyv's my favorite, I love how expressive she is ^.^
You should consider adapting comics with your art, your style fits perfectly for the job.

I'm not exactly taking requests on these, cause I plan on doing every champion at some point.
But I am doing sketch commissions in the same style as these drawings right now

very cool :D, i like all of em, love kal face expression lol
can you do one for {{champion:98}} or {{champion:62}} if u ever get da chance <3

shenpai keep em coming please <3

Yay Jhin art!

{{champion:202}} _"I'm not to fond of people sneaking backstage and getting pictures of me during my performances."_
That Jhin one is pure perfection {{champion:202}}
Glad you like it : D
Riot should hire you!

Fan Request: could you Read Mordes Bio and  draw one of these for Him.

 Also submit these to community roundup
Beautiful
Nice work Friend!
